patchNotes.title: Talent and mini hero-rework
patchNotes.developerCommentary: From the start, developers aimed to make Li Li an ideal starter hero. They didn't change her much, believing not all heroes need high viability or skill ceilings. However, I think every hero should have growth potential. Over time, a lack of this can deter players from choosing Li Li. Take Team Fortress 2's Soldier: simple yet with a high skill ceiling. Similarly, I want Li Li to be easy for beginners but also offer significant skill development opportunities.

texts.text: Additional functionality: Li Li's <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> marks healed allies with cups. After an allied hero receives 3 cups, Li Li can collect them, granting that hero the same effects of <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0>, including those from talents.

general.developerCommentary: This change aims to raise Li Li's skill ceiling by enhancing <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0>, necessitating a talent overhaul. The current <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> is too potent with this new ability interaction.

texts.text: Additional functionality: Passive: Li Li gains 6 mana by hitting blinded targets

general.developerCommentary: After the talent overhaul, I obliterated the mana talents, recognizing Li Li's need for mana. I aimed to provide a simple solution for her mana needs.
Given <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> mechanics, <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> was adjusted to be slightly weaker and more customizable.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> now affects allied heroes, so extending its duration also prolongs its effect on them.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: This talent is defensive, designed to encourage Li Li players to use it for escaping or engaging by enhancing <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> effects to be using on par with the new <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> effect. Bigger duration while affecting allied heros could be troublesome.

texts.text: <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> increase self and <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> attack speed by 25%

changes.developerCommentary: I don't want to give ability power to her because Ana cover this role and the basic abilities alredy give spell spower besides i think the interaction on giving spell power won't be so good for something that you could SUDDENLY receive as the <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> bonus and for that instance i choose attack speed. One more thing, allied heros with <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> should further increase <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> and Li Li attack speed

changes.name: New: <modified, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> now cleanses roots, stuns and silence on cast and expire
<vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> increase <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> cooldown speed an additional 50%

changes.developerCommentary: This new cleanse for Li Li is more user-friendly, balancing effectiveness with accessibility for new players. It's designed to be practical without being overly complex.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Every Time Li Li hit all <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> Targets makes her next cast hit one more target also increasing Li Li spell power by 10% each stack for 4 seconds , not hitting all targets reset the bonus

changes.developerCommentary: Now this is a thing i got the idea from the <modified, talents, 1, 0, lucio> i changed on resetting stacks, this talent always felt kinda weak and i wanted it to be stronger but not about necessarily about the damage and on that way i could say it makes the talent fair holds the nature of having more surging winds hits and could be a good entry for higher skill ceiling talents while not being so hard.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Li Li basic attacks againt blinded heroes increases the blind duration by 0.25 and bounces to the closest hero if the hero is also blinded the attack bounces again.

changes.developerCommentary: On this talent i wanted to give a more funny interaction with <modified, talents, 7, 1>..Initially i wanted to reduce it's cooldown by hitting blinded targets but that could become recursive by hitting blind targets you blind them..kinda off..For that instance i wanted to give a bigger meaning on blinding targets by also making it work with other blind synergies like <modified, abilities, basic, 2, johanna>  and <modified, abilities, basic, 1, cassia> and making the blind stronger overall.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Doesn't change ability refresh rate anymore
Passive: <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> increases Li Li health regeneration by 400%

changes.developerCommentary: Nerfing it would be necessary for the new <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> not become problematic as more ability refresh rate could become too strong when you can share it with other heroes. Health regeneration bonus could combo with more survavibility which is the main talent effect BUT i really don't know how much bonus health regen would be good as you could also give it to other heroes..imagine sharing health regen with <modified, talents, 1, 1, dehaka>? Character would have 2 seconds of 160 health regen.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>
